title: Test
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt in relation to GDP, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall National debt in relation to GDP has increased over the Year
National debt in relation to GDP is roughly constant from 2014 to 2024.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2021 and 2022.
Max National debt in relation to GDP about 115.77 was recorded at Year 2024
Min National debt in relation to GDP about 104.26 was recorded at Year 2018
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt in relation to GDP, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2018 to 2024.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
